// ROH.cpp : Defines the entry point for the console application.
//


#include<iostream>
#include<vector>
#include<stdio.h>
#include<set>
#include<algorithm>
#include<fstream>
#include<string>

using namespace std;

#define scan scanf
#define sscan sscanf_s
#define get gets_s
#define print printf 
#define mod 1000000009
#define ll long long
#define init int i,j,k,l,m,n,test
#define pause system("pause")
#define inf 1000000000
int main()
{
	init;
	scan("%d",&test);
	string s;
	int a[120];
	while(test--)
	{
		scan("%d %d %d",&n,&m,&k);
		int ans=0;
		for(i=0;i<n;i++)
		{
			cin>>s;
			int on=0;
			for(j=0;j<m;j++)
				if(s[j]=='*')
					on++;
			a[i]=on;
			ans+=on;
			//cout<<"hello"<<endl;

		}
		int thresh=m/2;
		sort(a,a+n);
		// first do the inverse for which a[i] is less than thresh, then for the [k/2] remove them and thentoggle the least
		for(i=0;i<k && i<n;i++)
		{
			if(a[i]<=thresh)
			{
				//invert
				ans-=a[i];
				ans+=(m-a[i]);
				a[i]=m-a[i];
			}
			else
			{
				//no need to stay here
				break;

			}


		}
		if(i<k && i<=n)
		{
			k=k-i;
			k=k%2;
			if(k>0)
			{

				sort(a,a+n);
				//choose the first one
				ans+=(m-2*a[0]);

			}

		}
		
		cout<<ans<<endl;
	}
		
		


}
